title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2620/84 of 14 September 1984 re-establishing the levying of the customs duties on phthalic anhydride, falling within subheading 29.15 C I, originating in Argentina, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3569/83 apply
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2620/84
of 14 September 1984
re-establishing the levying of the customs duties on phthalic anhydride, falling within subheading 29.15 C I, originating in Argentina, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3569/83 apply
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
As from 18 September 1984, the levying of customs duties, suspended pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 3569/83, shall be re-established on imports into the Community of the following products originating in Argentina:
1.2 //   //   // CCT heading No  // Description  //   //  // 29.15 C I (NIMEXE code 29.15-40)  // Phthalic anhydride  //   //

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 September 1984.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 362, 24. 12. 1983, p. 1.
